title: Cowboys, LeBron James, Zion Williamson, & where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Cowboys, LeBron James, Zion Williamson, & where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses the Dallas Cowboys putting the franchise tag on Dak Prescott, why LeBron James should be the MVP, the continued success of Zion Williamson, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, Jane Slater, Geoff Schwartz, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
